[page 642/642]
    Someone  was  once  telling  that  value  not  bigger  than  2  takes  no  more  than  4GB  of  VRAM,  
but
 
it
 
will
 
rather
 
differ
 
from
 
AMD/Intel
 
when
 
the
 
VRAM
 
usage
 
is
 
higher
 
due
 
to
 
lack
 
of
 
garbage
 
collector
 
present
 
in
 
CUDA.
